name: Ting Bai
content: Ting Bai - Renmin Univ. Of China About Me Ting Bai baiting AT bupt.edu.cn I am now an Assistant Professor in School of Computer Science, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications. I got my PhD degree in Renmin University of China in July 2019, supervised by Prof. Ji-Rong Wen and Prof. Xin Zhao . My major research interests are in Recommender systems, Human behavior analysis on large social and information networks. I had been a Visiting Research Student at University of Montreal, Canada, supervised by Prof. Jian-Yun Nie . I have published several papers as the First Author on SIGIR, KDD, CIKM, WSDM, TKDE, NAACL, JCST and so on, three of them won the Best Paper/ Best Paper Runner Up Awards on KDD'19 workshop, CIKM'17 and Big Data'15 respectively. And I was invited as Reviewers of TKDE,SIGIR,JCST, AAAI, AIRS and so on. I also serve as the Publicity Chair in IEEE ICDM 2020. Professional Activities I serve as Publicity Chair of IEEE ICDM (2020) I serve as Publicity Chair of IEEE ICKG (2022) Invited Reviewer for IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE) Invited Reviewer for Journal of Computer Science and Technology (JCST) I serve as PC of SIGIR I serve as PC of KDD I serve as PC of WWW I serve as PC of IJCAI I serve as PC of AAAI I serve as PC of WSDM I serve as PC of CIKM Selected Publications EMNLP'22 (Accept) A Multi-Modal Knowledge Graph for Classical Chinese Poetry.
